content.text:
# Online Film Critics Society Awards 2016

The 20th Online Film Critics Society, honoring the best in film for 2016, were announced on January 3, 2017. The nominations were announced on December 27, 2016.
Nominees
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Picture
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Director
|-
| valign="top" |
* Moonlight
* Arrival
* The Handmaiden
* Hell or High Water
* Jackie
* La La Land
* Manchester by the Sea
* O.J.: Made in America
* Paterson
* The Witch
| valign="top" |
* 'Barry Jenkins – Moonlight'
* Damien Chazelle – La La Land
* Pablo Larraín – Jackie
* Kenneth Lonergan – Manchester by the Sea
* Denis Villeneuve – Arrival
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Actor
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Casey Affleck – Manchester by the Sea'
* Adam Driver – Paterson
* Ryan Gosling – La La Land
* Viggo Mortensen – Captain Fantastic
* Denzel Washington – Fences
| valign="top" |
* 'Natalie Portman – Jackie'
* Amy Adams – Arrival
* Isabelle Huppert – Elle
* Ruth Negga – Loving
* Emma Stone – La La Land
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Supporting Actor
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Supporting Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Mahershala Ali – Moonlight'
* Tom Bennett – Love & Friendship
* Jeff Bridges – Hell or High Water
* Lucas Hedges – Manchester by the Sea
* Michael Shannon – Nocturnal Animals
| valign="top" |
* 'Naomie Harris – Moonlight'
* Viola Davis – Fences
* Lily Gladstone – Certain Women
* Octavia Spencer – Hidden Figures
* Michelle Williams – Manchester by the Sea
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Animated Feature
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Film Not in the English Language
|-
| valign="top" |
* Kubo and the Two Strings
* Finding Dory
* Moana
* The Red Turtle
* Zootopia
| valign="top" |
* The Handmaiden
* Elle
* Neruda
* The Salesman
* Toni Erdmann
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Documentary
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Non-U.S. Release (non-competitive category)
|-
| valign="top" |
* O.J.: Made in America
* 13th
* Cameraperson
* I Am Not Your Negro
* Weiner
| valign="top" |
* After the Storm
* The Death of Louis XIV
* The Girl with All the Gifts
* Graduation
* Nocturna
* Personal Shopper
* A Quiet Passion
* Staying Vertical
* The Unknown Girl
* Yourself and Yours
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Adapted Screenplay
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Original Screenplay
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Eric Heisserer – Arrival'
* David Birke – Elle
* Whit Stillman – Love & Friendship
* Barry Jenkins and Tarell Alvin McCraney – Moonlight
* Tom Ford – Nocturnal Animals
| valign="top" |
* 'Taylor Sheridan – Hell or High Water'
* Noah Oppenheim – Jackie
* Damien Chazelle – La La Land
* Yorgos Lanthimos and Efthimis Filippou – The Lobster
* Kenneth Lonergan – Manchester by the Sea
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Editing
! style="background:#EEDD82; width: 50%" | Best Cinematography
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Tom Cross – La La Land'
* Joe Walker – Arrival
* Nels Bangerter – Cameraperson
* Sebastián Sepúlveda – Jackie
* Nat Sanders and Joi McMillon – Moonlight
| valign="top" |
* 'Linus Sandgren – La La Land'
* Bradford Young – Arrival
* Stéphane Fontaine – Jackie
* James Laxton – Moonlight
* Natasha Braier – The Neon Demon
|}
